snippet: The police in Oakland said Thursday that they were investigating the possibility that a gunman who killed seven people at Oikos University had targeted several people, instead of just one.
abstract: Police in Oakland, Calif, are investigating whether a gunman who killed seven people at Oikos University had targeted several people instead of just one.
lead_paragraph: The police in Oakland said Thursday that they were investigating the possibility that a gunman who killed seven people at Oikos University had targeted several people, instead of just one.

headline.main: California: Gunman May Have Had Several Targets
headline.print_headline: California: Gunman May Have Had Several Targets
